channel.title: Else without if? :s
channel.description:
client.java:12299: 'else' without 'if' else { ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .
i keep getting that from my compiler, can anybody help please?

item.title: Else without if? :s
item.dc:creator: @mage_pwns mage pwns
item.description:
@mage_pwns wrote:

i already tried that? it throws 14 errors at me… ive looked at all possible solutions from that… they didnt work

Read full topic

item.title: Else without if? :s
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“x blitz x, post:4, topic:287740”][size=15pt]Error:[/size]

‘else’ without ‘if’

[size=15pt]Explanation:[/size]

The compiler has found an else keyword without a corresponding if condition. The compiler attempts to match else keywords with the closest previous if condition that does not already have a matching else.

[size=15pt]Checklist:[/size]

[ul][li][size=8]Is there a semicolon after an if condition? If so, remove the semicolon.[/size][/li]
[li]Is a curly brace missing? Is there an open curly brace, {, for the if statement’s true or false block without a corresponding closing curly brace, }?[/li]
[li]Does the true or false block for an if condition contain more than one statement? If so, verify that curly braces begin and end the block. [/li][/ul][/quote]

Read full topic
